review_title: Tread lightly at Kreider, the ice is thin.
pros: The best thing about Kreider Services is the Christmas and anniversary bonuses given.  And, we enjoy food in the office regularly through birthdays and other special occassions which allows for communication with co-workers about things other than work.
cons: Closed door, no communication with senior management and their disinterest in keeping employees happy.  Also, they strongly discourage using our benefit time to take time off work.  If you use all of your vacation, personal and sick time you run the risk of being disciplined (written up, or eventually fired).  Not family oriented.
